page.title: 05Recent Changes
page.content: The village is no longer as it used to be.Only a few of the old cottages remain.My nan lives in one which is over 400 years old.She always said that she had a ghost in her cottage but my dad never believed her until an ash tray flew across the room one night and so he had to believe her. Some of the old shops have also disappeared. I remember the old butcher's shop which was next door to the Co-op my mum and I used to go there every Monday morning but it has gone now and has been converted into a house.There used to be a Doctor's in Main Street but that has been converted into an Insurance agency. There was also a Post Office but that too was converted into a house along with Maton's shop where my mum used to work.They were all good shops for the village but they have gone now-how sad
